# Nisarth Patel — Digital Growth Specialist

> This file helps AI tools understand this website. For more, visit https://nisarthpatel.github.io/

## About

Nisarth Patel is a freelance digital growth specialist based in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India. He has 4+ years of experience helping businesses grow through SEO, AI automation, web development, and digital marketing. He works with startups, local businesses, and growing brands across India and internationally.

## Services Offered

- **SEO Consulting** – Technical audits, keyword strategy, on-page/off-page optimisation, monthly performance tracking
- **AEO (Answer Engine Optimisation)** – FAQ schema, featured snippet optimisation, direct-answer content
- **GEO (Generative Engine Optimisation)** – Getting businesses cited by ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini, and AI Overviews
- **Google My Business Optimisation** – Profile setup, category research, review strategy, local citation building
- **Website Performance Optimisation** – Core Web Vitals, image compression, caching, mobile speed
- **Online Reputation Management** – Review monitoring, brand mentions, negative review strategy
- **n8n Workflow Automation** – Custom workflow design, multi-app integrations, self-hosted or cloud deployment
- **AI-Powered Business Automation** – AI-driven decision logic, OpenAI/LLM integration, automated reporting
- **Custom AI Tool Integration** – LLM API integration, prompt engineering, RAG and knowledge base setup
- **Zapier / Make.com Automation** – Multi-app workflows, API connections, CRM sync
- **AI Chatbot Setup** – Website and WhatsApp chatbots, custom knowledge base, CRM integration
- **Marketing Automation** – Email sequences, WhatsApp follow-ups, lead nurture pipelines
- **Website Development** – Custom design, SEO-ready, mobile-first, performance optimised
- **App Development** – Web apps, admin panels, dashboards, API integrations
- **UI/UX Optimisation** – Conversion rate optimisation, heatmap analysis, A/B testing
- **Digital Marketing** – Google Ads, Meta Ads, content marketing, email campaigns
- **Social Media Management** – Content planning, post creation, community engagement
- **Lead Generation** – Lead funnel design, landing page optimisation, CRM tracking
- **Email Marketing** – Newsletter strategy, automated sequences, list segmentation

## Key Differentiators

- Specialises in both traditional SEO and emerging disciplines (AEO, GEO)
- Builds AI automation workflows using n8n, Make.com, and Zapier
- Combines SEO expertise with web development for performance-first sites
- Data-driven approach with transparent, plain-language reporting
- Free website audit offered (SEO health, page speed, UX)
- Based in India, works with clients internationally
